changeRepositionOverride.theText:
Gamorrean Guards: Move away from the Rebels.
{-} All others: Block line of sight to the Gamorrean Guards.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You reach the entrance of Jabba’s palace, blasting away the TT-8L/Y7 droid jutting out of the gate. After a quick bypass, the gate opens before you.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: You are quickly surrounded by guards and Imperials Jabba has paid off, aiming their weapons at you. "E chu ta!," the Gamorrean guards grunt at you, raising their polearms.

You spot the keys to the throne room door hanging from one of the Gamorrean's belts.

{-} When the regular Gamorrean Guards are defeated, the door to the Throne Room unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Throne Room opens.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.
Defeat the Gamorrean Guards.

{-} When the regular Gamorrean Guards are defeated, the door to the Throne Room unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Throne Room opens.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
"This is your last chance, Jabba!" you shout. As you corner the crime lord in his back room, you grab one of the chains he uses to bind his slaves and wrap it around his bulbous neck.

With his neck noosed in steel, and weapons pointed at his face, the Hutt has no choice but to surrender. "Oh ho ho," he laughs. "I admire your tenacity. If you let me live, I will free all the prisoners and make a generous donation to the Rebellion. If you kill me, you get nothing but revenge."

Days later, while traveling to a new haven world, you receive a holographic communication from Mon Mothma: "You have done our cause proud. It took incredible self-restraint not to simply execute that piece of slime for all he had done to you. And now, after the finances we've received, we will be able to harbor twice the number of civilians as before. Thousands owe you their lives, and we owe you our gratitude."

You  close the receiver and return to your family, settling in for the rest of the journey with your loved ones.

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You are pinned down by Gamorreans, stripped of your weapons, bound, and brought before Jabba. He lets out a low, slow laugh as you stand in silence. Bib Fortuna walks out and stands directly in front of you.

"You are foolish in the enemies you make," he hisses at you. "We only hope that your families are stronger slaves than you are warriors. Take them away; we will throw them into the Great Pit of Carkoon tomorrow."

As you are dragged away to your cell, your ears are filled with the screeches of Salacious B. Crumb’s taunts and the low rumblings of Jabba's taunting laughter.

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.

globalEvents.name: Rancor activation
globalEvents.eventText:
Malakili utters a sharp order in Huttese, claps his hands, and points at you. The rancor roars and lumbers toward you.

{-} The <color="red">Rancor</color> gains 1 {g} and moves 5 toward the closest hero.

globalEvents.name: Malakili defeated
globalEvents.eventText: Malakili screams as your attacks hit him. He scrambles back, and a hidden door slams shut behind him.

entityProperties.name: Malakili
entityProperties.theText:
Malakili, Jabba's beastmaster, is driving the rancor on.

{-} Malakili is an Imperial figure (Health: 8, Defense: None).

eventActions.theText:
{-} The red highlighted spaces are the Trap Door. A figure that enters or occupies the Trap Door suffers 1 {C} and then places his figure on any space (players' choice) on the Rancor Pit.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Rancor</color> is defeated.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Gamorreans Defeated
globalEvents.eventText:
The last Gamorrean falls with a squeal, and you take the keys from his belt. The way to Jabba is free.

{-} The door to the throne room is now unlocked.

entityProperties.name: Throne Room Door
entityProperties.theText: The door leading into Jabba's throne room is gorgeously adorned, signalling the wealth and power of the great Hutt crime lord.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the door.
Open the door to the Throne Room.

globalEvents.name: Legions of Defenders
globalEvents.eventText: You hear a loud grunt, then more Gamorreans rush in.

globalEvents.name: Storming In
globalEvents.eventText: You throw open the door to Jabba's throne room and rush in. The room is large and magnificent, with a comfortable platform for Jabba and a large bandstand.

entityProperties.name: Throne Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door leading into Jabba's throne room is gorgeously adorned, signalling the wealth and power of the great Hutt crime lord.

{-} The door is locked. When both Gamorrean Guards have been defeated, the door unlocks.

eventActions.theText: From his platform, the Hutt watches you. He looks more amused then alarmed.

entityProperties.name: Salacious B. Crumb
entityProperties.theText: Place the Salacious B. Crumb companion here.

entityProperties.name: Jabba
entityProperties.theText: {-} A hero can interact with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> ({K} or {J}) to try and negotiate with him, even if he is incapacitated. To do so, select "Try to negotiate". If <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is not incapacitated, apply -X {B} to the results, where X is 5 minus 1 for every 2 {H} the Hutt has suffered.

eventActions.theText:
Next to Jabba, his obnoxious pet Salacious B. Crumb cackles, then jumps down from the platform.

{-} Place the Salacious B. Crumb companion in the yellow highlighted space.
{-} <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> cannot be defeated. When he would be defeated, he becomes incapacitated instead. While incapacitated, <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> can only perform 1 action per activation.
Jabba booms with laughter, snot and slime flying, as legions of defenders rush in to stop you.

You grab your weapons and face your enemies. Time to show Jabba that you are not to be trifled with.

{-} A hero can interact with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> ({K} or {J}) to try and negotiate with him, even if he is incapacitated. To do so, click the green highlight and select "Try to negotiate". If <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is not incapacitated, apply -X {B} to the results, where X is 5 minus 1 for every 2 {H} the Hutt has suffered.
{-} The mission will progress when a hero negotiates with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.
Block access to <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.
Negotiate with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.

{-} <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> cannot be defeated. When he would be defeated, he becomes incapacitated instead. While incapacitated, <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> can only perform 1 action per activation.
{-} A hero can interact with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> ({K} or {J}) to try and negotiate with him, even if he is incapacitated. To do so, click the green highlight and select "Try to negotiate". If <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is not incapacitated, apply -X {B} to the results, where X is 5 minus 1 for every 2 {H} the Hutt has suffered.
{-} The mission will progress when a hero negotiates with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Hutt Retreat
globalEvents.eventText: For a moment, the Hutt looks frightened, and you move closer. But your are ultimately lured into his trap. He slams a button with his slug-like fist and the trap door in front of his throne opens into a pit below.

entityProperties.name: Jabba
entityProperties.theText: {-} A hero can interact with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> ({K} or {J}) to try and negotiate with him, even if he is incapacitated. To do so, select "Try to negotiate". If <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is not incapacitated, apply -X {B} to the results, where X is 5 minus 1 for every 2 {H} the Hutt has suffered.

entityProperties.name: Trap Door
entityProperties.theText:
The trap door leads down into the Rancor pit.

{-} A figure that enters or occupies the Trap Door suffers 1 {C} and then places his figure on any space (players' choice) on the Rancor Pit.

eventActions.theText:
You try to keep your balance, but you tumble into the pit.

{-} The red highlighted spaces are the Trap Door. A figure that enters or occupies the Trap Door suffers 1 {C} and then places his figure on any space (players' choice) on the Rancor Pit.
{-} The hero that negotiated with <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> suffers 1 {C}, then places his figure on any space on the Rancor Pit.
In a large door leading into the Rancor Pit, a chubby man with a bare chest appears. He points toward you and utters a sharp order in Huttese.

entityProperties.name: Malakili
entityProperties.theText:
Malakili, Jabba's beastmaster, is driving the rancor on.

{-} Malakili is an Imperial figure (Health: 8, Defense: None).

eventActions.theText: {-} The neutral mission token is Malakili. Malakili is an Imperial figure (Health: 8, Defense: None).
There is a terrifying roar as the fearsome Rancor emerges.
Behind you, some unfortunate Gamorrean guards that were in the wrong place at the wrong time come tumbling down into the pit, too.
Jabba uses the commotion to slither into the back room, the door slamming shut behind him.
{-} Place <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> in the yellow highlighted spaces. <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> recovers all {H} and is no longer incapacitated.

The Rancor roars and sets his small, beady eyes on you.

{-} Each Rebel figure may choose to either gain 4 movement points, recover 3 {C}, or become <color="red">Focused</color>.
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Rancor</color> is defeated.
Defeat the <color="red">Rancor</color>.

{-} The red highlighted spaces are the Trap Door. A figure that enters or occupies the Trap Door suffers 1 {C} and then places his figure on any space (players' choice) on the Rancor Pit.
{-} The neutral mission token is Malakili. Malakili is an Imperial figure (Health: 8, Defense: None).
{-} The mission will progress when the <color="red">Rancor</color> is defeated.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.

You advance toward Jabba with your weapon drawn to make him see your point.

Test {K} or {J}. If <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is not incapacitated, apply -X {B} to the results, where X is 5 minus 1 for every 2 {H} the Hutt has suffered.

inputList.theText: Jabba just lets out a booming laugh as his mercenaries close in.

globalEvents.name: Final Showdown
globalEvents.eventText:
As the Rancor crashes to the ground with one last, almost whimpering roar, Jabba's forces appear frozen with shock first. Some immediately scramble to climb the walls of the pit.

{-} Place all Imperial figures on the Rancor Pit adjacent to the Trap Door.
{-} A hero adjacent to a wall on the Rancor Pit gains {A}: Test {K}. If successful, place your figure in a space adjacent to the Trap Door. You may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the test results.

entityProperties.name: Trap Door
entityProperties.theText:
The trap door leads down into the Rancor pit.

{-} A figure that enters or occupies the Trap Door suffers 1 {C} and then places his figure on any space (players' choice) on the Rancor Pit.
{-} A hero adjacent to a wall on the Rancor Pit gains {A}: Test {K}. If successful, place your figure in a space adjacent to the Trap Door. You may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the test results.

entityProperties.name: Back Room Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into a back room behind the throne.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Back Room (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The door to the Back Room does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText:
You can hear the Hutt behind the closed door shouting orders, now sounding enraged - and fearful.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Back Room (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The door to the Back Room does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.
{-} <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> no longer becomes incapacitated when he would be defeated.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is defeated.
Block access to <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.
Defeat <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.

{-} A hero adjacent to a wall on the Rancor Pit gains {A}: Test {K}. If successful, place your figure in a space adjacent to the Trap Door. You may suffer 2 {C} before performing the test to apply +1 {B} to the test results.
{-} The door to the Back Room is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Back Room (Health: 8, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The door to the Back Room does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is defeated.
{-} The mission ends at the end of Round 8, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Destroy Back Room Door
globalEvents.eventText: Your attacks reduce the door to cinders.
